Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Develop animal identification, traceability and performance recording.
Include livestock data in the agriculture census.
Develop a database on livestock production at the central level.

Guidance for increased environmental sustainability

P7. Include data on environmental performance (e.g., GHG emission accounting, manure management practices, and farm-level nutrient balances) in livestock information systems.
P7. Include training and resources for the collection of census data that can environmental performance assessment.
